description: armorial oviform vase; arms of Augustinian Order; body painted with six large panels, each surmounted by the Augustinian monastery in Macao; two panels with Augustinian order, double arrows with heart in two clays; one panel with peacock with two birds around its head and two elephants flying among branches; other panels with dogs beneath trees
dimension: a (jar): H.16-1/2 x Dia.12 in.; b (stand): H.6-7/8 x Dia.10-1/2 in.
title: Jar and Stand
